notification_messages.WELCOME: Welcome, {{name}}! We are excited to have you on board.
notification_messages.NEW_BID: {{bidderName}} placed a new bid of {{amount}} on your product '{{productName}}'.
notification_messages.BID_ACCEPTED_SELLER: You accepted a bid for '{{productName}}'. The process will now move to mediation.
notification_messages.BID_REJECTED_BY_YOU: You rejected a bid from {{bidderName}} for '{{productName}}'.
notification_messages.BID_ACCEPTED_BUYER: Your bid of {{amount}} for '{{productName}}' was accepted by the seller!
notification_messages.BID_REJECTED: Your bid for '{{productName}}' was rejected by the seller. Reason: {{reason}}
notification_messages.BID_CANCELLED_BY_UPDATE: Your bid on '{{productName}}' was cancelled because the seller updated the product. You may place a new bid.
notification_messages.PRODUCT_APPROVED: Your product '{{productName}}' has been approved by an admin.
notification_messages.PRODUCT_DELETED: Your product '{{productName}}' was deleted by administrator '{{adminName}}'. Reason: {{reason}}
notification_messages.NEW_PRODUCT_PENDING: Vendor '{{vendorName}}' submitted a new product '{{productName}}' for your approval.
notification_messages.PRODUCT_UPDATE_PENDING: Vendor '{{vendorName}}' updated product '{{productName}}'. It now requires re-approval.
notification_messages.MEDIATION_REJECTED_BY_MEDIATOR_SELECT_NE: The mediator '{{mediatorName}}' rejected the task for '{{productName}}'. Please select a new mediator.
notification_messages.BID_ACCEPTED_PENDING_MEDIATOR: Your bid for '{{productName}}' was accepted. The seller will now select a mediator.
notification_messages.SELLER_CONFIRMED_AWAITING_YOUR_ACTION: The seller for '{{productName}}' has confirmed readiness. Please confirm and deposit the escrow to proceed.
notification_messages.MEDIATION_ASSIGNED: You have been assigned as a mediator for the transaction involving '{{productName}}'.
notification_messages.MEDIATION_TASK_ACCEPTED_SELF: You have accepted the mediation task for '{{productName}}'.
notification_messages.MEDIATION_TASK_REJECTED_SELF: You have rejected the mediation task for '{{productName}}'.
notification_messages.MEDIATION_ACCEPTED_BY_MEDIATOR: Mediator '{{mediatorName}}' has accepted the task for '{{productName}}'. Both parties must now confirm their readiness.
notification_messages.PARTY_CONFIRMED_READINESS: {{userName}} has confirmed readiness for the mediation of '{{productName}}'.
notification_messages.MEDIATION_COMPLETED: The mediation for '{{productName}}' has been successfully completed.
notification_messages.MEDIATION_CANCELLED: The mediation for '{{productName}}' has been cancelled. Reason: {{reason}}
notification_messages.MEDIATION_DISPUTED: A dispute has been opened for the mediation of '{{productName}}'. An admin will review the case.
notification_messages.DISPUTE_RESOLVED_ADMIN: The dispute regarding '{{productTitle}}' has been resolved by an administrator. Please check the details.
notification_messages.MEDIATION_CANCELLATION_CONFIRMED: Your request to cancel the mediation for '{{productName}}' has been confirmed.
notification_messages.MEDIATION_REJECTED_BY_BUYER: The buyer has cancelled the mediation for '{{productName}}'. The product is now available for bidding again.
notification_messages.NEW_CHAT_MESSAGE: {{senderName}} sent a new message in the chat for '{{productName}}'.
notification_messages.NEW_ADMIN_SUBCHAT_MESSAGE: An admin sent a message in your private chat regarding '{{productName}}'.
notification_messages.NEW_MEDIATOR_APPLICATION: User '{{userName}}' has applied to become a mediator. Please review their application.
notification_messages.MEDIATOR_APP_APPROVED: Congratulations! Your application to become a mediator has been approved.
notification_messages.MEDIATOR_APP_REJECTED: Your application to become a mediator was rejected. Reason: {{reason}}
notification_messages.MEDIATOR_APP_PENDING: Your application to become a mediator is now pending review.
notification_messages.ADMIN_BALANCE_ADJUSTMENT: Admin '{{adminName}}' adjusted your account balances. Changes: {{changes}}
notification_messages.USER_BALANCE_ADJUSTED: You adjusted the balances for user '{{userName}}'.
notification_messages.NEW_DEPOSIT_REQUEST: A new deposit request of {{amount}} has been submitted by '{{userName}}'.
notification_messages.DEPOSIT_APPROVED: Your deposit request of {{amount}} has been approved.
notification_messages.DEPOSIT_REJECTED: Your deposit request of {{amount}} was rejected. Reason: {{reason}}
notification_messages.DEPOSIT_PENDING: Your deposit request of {{amount}} is pending.
notification_messages.NEW_WITHDRAWAL_REQUEST: Your withdrawal request for {{amount}} has been submitted and is now pending review.
notification_messages.NEW_WITHDRAWAL_REQUEST_ADMIN: User '{{userName}}' has submitted a new withdrawal request for {{amount}}.
notification_messages.WITHDRAWAL_APPROVED: Your withdrawal request of {{amount}} has been approved.
notification_messages.WITHDRAWAL_PROCESSING: Your withdrawal request of {{amount}} is now being processed.
notification_messages.WITHDRAWAL_COMPLETED: Your withdrawal of {{amount}} via {{methodName}} is complete.
notification_messages.WITHDRAWAL_REJECTED: Your withdrawal request for {{amount}} via {{methodName}} was rejected. Reason: {{reason}}
notification_messages.FUNDS_NOW_AVAILABLE: Funds amounting to {{amount}} from the sale of '{{productName}}' are now available in your account.
notification_messages.NEW_USER_REPORT: {{reporterName}} has submitted a new report against {{reportedUserName}}. Reason: {{reason}}.
notification_messages.REPORT_STATUS_UPDATE: The status of your report regarding {{reportedUserName}} has been updated to: {{status}}.
notification_messages.NEW_TICKET_CREATED: New ticket '#{{ticketId}}: {{title}}' has been submitted by user {{userName}}.
notification_messages.TICKET_REPLY: {{senderName}} left a new reply on your ticket '#{{ticketId}}'.
notification_messages.TICKET_CLOSED_BY_USER: The user has closed ticket '#{{ticketId}}'. No further action needed.
notification_messages.TICKET_STATUS_UPDATED: The status of your ticket '#{{ticketId}}' has been updated to: {{status}}.
notification_messages.TICKET_ASSIGNED_TO_YOU: You have been assigned to handle ticket '#{{ticketId}}' from {{userName}}.
notification_messages.TICKET_ASSIGNMENT_UPDATED: The assignment for ticket '#{{ticketId}}' has been updated. It is now handled by {{supportName}}.
notification_messages.ACCOUNT_BLOCKED: Your account has been blocked by an administrator. Reason: {{reason}}
notification_messages.ACCOUNT_UNBLOCKED: Your account has been unblocked by an administrator. Welcome back!
notification_messages.MEDIATOR_APP_PENDING_GUARANTEE: Your application to become a mediator (based on Guarantee) is now pending review. {{amount}} has been reserved from your balance.
notification_messages.MEDIATOR_APP_REJECTED_GUARANTEE_RETURNED: We regret to inform you that your application to become a mediator was rejected by admin "{{adminName}}". Reason: {{reason}}. The guarantee amount has been returned to your main balance.
notification_messages.MEDIATION_AUTO_REJECTED_SELLER: Mediator {{mediatorName}} did not respond to the assignment for '{{productName}}' within {{minutes}} minutes. Please select a new mediator.
notification_messages.MEDIATION_TASK_EXPIRED: You did not respond to the mediation assignment for '{{productName}}' within the {{minutes}}-minute time limit, so it has been automatically cancelled.
notification_messages.MEDIATOR_SELECTION_CONFIRMED: You have successfully selected {{mediatorName}} as the mediator for "{{productName}}". They have been notified.
notification_messages.MEDIATION_ASSIGNED_TO_MEDIATOR: You have been selected by {{sellerName}} for a transaction regarding "{{productName}}" with {{buyerName}}. Please review and respond.
notification_messages.MEDIATOR_SELECTED_BY_SELLER: {{sellerName}} has selected {{mediatorName}} as the mediator for your transaction regarding "{{productName}}". Please wait for them to accept.
notification_messages.MEDIATION_ACCEPTED_BY_MEDIATOR_FOR_SELLE: {{mediatorName}} has accepted to mediate your transaction for '{{productName}}' with buyer {{buyerName}}. Please proceed to confirm your readiness.
notification_messages.MEDIATION_ACCEPTED_BY_MEDIATOR_FOR_BUYER: {{mediatorName}} has accepted to mediate your transaction for '{{productName}}' with seller {{sellerName}}. Please proceed to confirm your readiness.
notification_messages.PARTIES_CONFIRMED: All parties have confirmed readiness for '{{productName}}'. The mediation chat will be initiated shortly.
notification_messages.SELLER_CONFIRMED_FOR_BUYER: Seller '{{sellerName}}' for '{{productName}}' has confirmed readiness. Please confirm your readiness and escrow the funds.
notification_messages.MEDIATION_REJECTED_FOR_SELLER: {{mediatorName}} has rejected the assignment for '{{productName}}'. Reason: '{{reason}}'. Please select a new mediator.
notification_messages.MEDIATION_REJECTED_FOR_BUYER: The mediator for '{{productName}}' (with seller {{sellerName}}) has rejected the assignment. The seller will select a new one.
notification_messages.MEDIATION_CANCELLED_BY_BUYER_FOR_SELLER: Buyer '{{buyerName}}' has cancelled the mediation for '{{productName}}'. Reason: '{{reason}}'. The product may be available again.
notification_messages.MEDIATION_CANCELLATION_CONFIRMED_FOR_BUY: You have successfully cancelled the mediation for '{{productName}}'.
notification_messages.MEDIATION_CANCELLED_BY_BUYER_FOR_MEDIATO: The mediation for '{{productName}}' has been cancelled by the buyer, '{{buyerName}}'. Reason: '{{reason}}'.
notification_messages.BUYER_CONFIRMED_AWAITING_YOUR_ACTION: '{{buyerName}}' has confirmed readiness and escrowed funds for '{{productName}}'. Please confirm your readiness to proceed.
notification_messages.MEDIATION_STARTED: All parties have confirmed for '{{productName}}'. The chat with mediator {{mediatorName}} has now started.
notification_messages.SALE_FUNDS_PENDING: Buyer '{{buyerName}}' has confirmed receipt for '{{productName}}'. Your funds of {{amount}} are now on hold.
notification_messages.MEDIATION_FEE_RECEIVED: You have received your mediation fee of {{feeAmount}} for '{{productName}}'.
notification_messages.LEVEL_UP_REWARD: You have received a reward of {{rewardAmount}} {{rewardCurrency}} for reaching Level {{level}}. Keep up the great work!
notification_messages.PRODUCT_RECEIPT_CONFIRMED: Buyer '{{buyerName}}' has confirmed receipt of '{{productName}}'. The transaction is now complete.
notification_messages.MEDIATION_CANCELLED_BY_ADMIN: The mediation regarding '{{productName}}' has been cancelled by an administrator. Notes: {{notes}}
notification_messages.DISPUTE_RESOLVED_WINNER: The dispute regarding '{{productName}}' has been resolved in your favor. Admin notes: {{notes}}
notification_messages.DISPUTE_RESOLVED_LOSER: The dispute regarding '{{productName}}' was not resolved in your favor. Admin notes: {{notes}}
notification_messages.DISPUTE_RESOLVED_NEUTRAL: The dispute regarding '{{productName}}' has been resolved by an administrator. Notes: {{notes}}
notification_messages.MEDIATION_DISPUTED_BY_YOU: You have opened a dispute regarding '{{productName}}'. An admin will review the situation.
notification_messages.MEDIATION_DISPUTED_BY_OTHER: User '{{userName}}' has opened a dispute regarding '{{productName}}'. An admin will review the situation.
notification_messages.MEDIATION_DISPUTED_FOR_ADMIN: User '{{userName}}' has opened a dispute regarding '{{productName}}'. Your intervention is required.
notification_messages.BALANCE_TRANSFER_SUCCESS: You have successfully transferred {{amount}} from your seller balance to your main balance.
notification_messages.REPORT_STATUS_ACTION_TAKEN: Admin {{adminName}} has reviewed your report regarding {{reportedUserName}} and appropriate action has been taken. Details: {{details}}
notification_messages.REPORT_STATUS_DISMISSED: Admin {{adminName}} has reviewed your report regarding {{reportedUserName}}. After investigation, it was dismissed. Reason: {{details}}
notification_messages.REPORT_STATUS_NEEDS_MORE_INFO: Admin {{adminName}} is reviewing your report regarding {{reportedUserName}} and requires more information. Details: {{details}}
notification_messages.BADGE_UPDATED: Your reputation badge has been updated to {{badgeName}}.
notification_messages.ACHIEVEMENT_UNLOCKED: Congratulations! You unlocked a new achievement: "{{achievementName}}".

rejectMediationByBuyerModal.aboutToCancel: You are about to cancel the mediation for the product:
rejectMediationByBuyerModal.placeholder: Please provide a clear reason for cancelling...
rejectMediationByBuyerModal.reasonRequired: A reason for cancellation is required.

rejectAssignmentModal.title: Reject Mediation Assignment
rejectAssignmentModal.aboutToReject: You are about to reject the assignment for the product:
rejectAssignmentModal.placeholder: Please provide a clear reason for rejecting this assignment...
rejectAssignmentModal.reasonRequired: A reason for rejection is required.

buyer.confirmSuccessWait: Readiness confirmed and funds escrowed successfully. Waiting for seller to confirm.
buyer.confirmSuccessBothReady: Readiness confirmed, funds escrowed. Both parties are ready. The chat will open shortly.

default.title: Status Information
default.content: No detailed explanation available for this status.

inProgress.title: What Happens Next?
inProgress.subtitle: The transaction is active. There are two possible outcomes:

happyPath.title: Successful Completion
happyPath.description: If the buyer confirms receipt of the product:
happyPath.p1: The escrowed funds are transferred to the seller's on-hold balance for 48 hours for security.
happyPath.p2: The mediator receives their full fee.
happyPath.p3: All participants (Buyer, Seller, Mediator) receive +1 reputation point.
happyPath.p4: All participants will be able to rate each other.

disputePath.title: Dispute Resolution
disputePath.description: If a dispute is opened, an admin will intervene and make a final decision:
disputePath.ifBuyerWins: If Admin rules for the Buyer:
disputePath.buyerWinsResult: The buyer is fully refunded. The seller loses 1 reputation point, and the buyer gains +1 point.
disputePath.ifSellerWins: If Admin rules for the Seller:
disputePath.sellerWinsResult: The funds are released to the seller. The buyer loses 1 reputation point, and the seller gains +1 point.
disputePath.cancelResult: The buyer is refunded (minus half of the mediator fee). The mediator receives half their fee. No reputation points are changed.

completed.title: Transaction Completed
completed.subtitle: Here is a summary of the final results:
completed.fundsOnHold: Seller's funds are on-hold for 48 hours for buyer protection.
completed.reputation: Buyer, Seller, and Mediator each received +1 reputation point.

adminResolved.title: Dispute Resolved by Admin
adminResolved.description: An administrator has reviewed this case and made a final decision.

feeModal.title: Mediator Fee Structure
feeModal.description: The mediator's fee is calculated based on the agreed price of the product (converted to TND) and is split equally between the buyer and the seller.

example.title: Example Calculation
example.dynamicScenario: Based on the agreed price of <1>{{price}}</1> for this transaction:
example.noData: Calculation details will be shown once a price is agreed upon.

transferBalanceModal.title: Transfer Seller Balance
transferBalanceModal.tooltip: Transfer funds to your main balance

errors.positive: Amount must be a positive number.
errors.insufficient: Insufficient seller balance for this transfer.
errors.unknown: An unknown error occurred. Please try again.
errors.noBalance: You have no available seller balance to transfer.

achievements.pageSubtitle: Explore the milestones you can achieve on the platform.
achievements.progressSubtitle: You have unlocked {{unlocked}} out of {{total}} achievements.

leaderboard.pageSubtitle: Meet the legends and most active members of the platform.
leaderboard.empty: Not enough data for this leaderboard yet.

referrals.noReferralsYet: No referrals yet. Share your code!
referrals.newReferralJoinedToast: Welcome {{name}}! You have joined our program.

inviteCard.title: Invite Friends and Earn
inviteCard.subtitle: Share your referral code and earn a permanent commission from every deposit they make.

bindCard.title: Do you have a referral code?
bindCard.subtitle: Enter your friend's code to support them.
